data.title: 40750 FM 2481, Hico, TX 76457
data.meta_description: 40750 FM 2481, Hico, TX 76457 ∙ $1,180,000 ∙ 42.03 Acres Lot, County Homes/Acreage ∙ View more.
data.text:
42.03 Lot Acres

Country Homes/Acreage

Audio narrative

40750 FM 2481 is listed for sale at $ 1,180,000. This is a Country Homes/Acreage property. It was built in 2022. The lot size is 42.03 Acres. ##BR##Step onto this picturesque ranch boasting a two-story home tucked away in the back of 42 acres. (42.030 acres out of 54.030 acres) With a magnificent view over the property, this modern home has all the amenities. Glass double doors lead you from the front porch into an open living space that invites relaxation and casual entertainment. The unique kitchen island provides a statement piece to center meals around while granite counters and custom cabinets add both style and functionality. Downstairs, this home offers 2 ample bedrooms and a stunning master with a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom including a soaking tub and walk in shower. The lovely floating staircase brings you upstairs to the 4th bedroom and 3rd bathroom. An additional room can function as a game room, theater, or office. Located just miles from the Cowboy Capital of the world, this is the perfect retreat with ample room for livestock or horses and a large shop and hay barn.

Description
